data.eml:eml: Late Cretaceous species of Vologesia (Echinoidea, Cassiduloida) from northern Spain

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schlüter, Nils, Wiese, Frank (2017): Late Cretaceous species of Vologesia (Echinoidea, Cassiduloida) from northern Spain. Zootaxa 4306 (2): 261-270, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.2.6
